description: A vulnerability was found in ywoa up to 2024.07.03. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /oa/setup/setup.jsp. The manipulation leads to improper authorization. The attack can be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 2024.07.04 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
